title: How to Make Breaded Tofu Sticks

steps.headline: Slice the tofu into finger size pieces.
Dip in water and roll in the breadcrumbs.
steps.description: Breadcrumbs mixed with oregano and parsley are especially tasty.

steps.headline: Serve.
steps.description: They can be eaten as they are or accompanied by steamed veggies and a condiment or dipping sauce.

text: Preheat the oven to 400ºF/200ºC.  Slice the tofu into finger size pieces.  Dip in water and roll in the breadcrumbs. Breadcrumbs mixed with oregano and parsley are especially tasty. Place in the oven. Bake for 15 minutes. Serve. They can be eaten as they are or accompanied by steamed veggies and a condiment or dipping sauce.
